metadata.title: Acrylic Powder,18 Colors Nail Dip Powder, Nail Acrylic Powder Sets Art Tips UV Gel Nail Acrylic Color Powder Decoration 3D Manicure

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of acrylic nail powder, which is used for nail art and polish. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Nail Art & Polish' subcategory of 'Foot, Hand & Nail Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
